roleset.name: raise the price or sell to a higher bidder after an oral sale

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: -LRB- Excuse me while I do a little - this is a building 0 we nearly bought through normal channels 5 years ago , got gazumped on and never thought we 'd ever get another crack at it ! -RRB-

roleset.note: GAZUMP-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from gazump.01-v)
